text: jo kshama yaachana karane, vandana karane tatha allaah kee stuti karane vaale, roza rakhane tatha rukoo aur sajda karane vaale, bhalaee ka aadesh dene aur buraee se rokane vaale tatha allaah kee seemaon kee raksha karane vaale hain aur (he nabee!) aap aise eemaan vaalon ko shubh soochana suna den
